UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Trypsin inhibitory loop is an excellent lead structure to design serine protease inhibitors and antimicrobial peptides
Literature.Author: Li J, Zhang C, Xu X, Wang J, Yu H, Lai R, Gong W

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2.84µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 2592(MIC=2.12µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=2.44µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 2002(MIC=4.76µg/ml)
